alert.note: Alert for Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 24 at 1:31PM MST until December 26 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Moderate snow at times. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches below 6000 feet with up to 17 inches across mountains and passes above 6000 feet. Winds gusting to 35 mph at times may produce areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Centennial and Big Hold Mountains including Targhee and Pine Creek Passes. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening and morning commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Big Hole Mountains; Centennial Mountains, Island Park
